duties_responsibilities.duty: Data modeling, building, and refactoring data marts.
Automating best practices and designing principles for data modeling.
Developing new data pipelines and ETL processes, as well as enhancing existing ones.
Transitioning data pipelines to dbt and creating features for data scientists.
Building systems to automate monitoring and alerting for data anomalies.
Building internal data products to automate workflows and reduce manual work.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or related field.
